COIN().details: does a Uniswap pool exist for this token?

addController(address).details: Add an address allowed to control this contract

coinQuote(address,uint256).details: Get a quote in Ethereum for the given ERC20 token / token amount

factory().details: does a Uniswap pool exist for this token?

getPair(address,address).details: looks for a pool vs weth

getPathForCoinToToken(address).details: Get a path for ethereum to the given token

getReserves(address).details: Get the pair reserves given two erc20 tokens

isController(address).details: Check if this address is a controller

relinquishControl().details: Remove the sender address from the list of controllers
